Environment State#

Base class#

class EnvironmentState#
__init__(*args, **kwargs)#

Geometric#

class LineSegment#

A static obstacle of linear shape.

__init__(p1: Vector2, p2: Vector2) → None#

Constructs a new instance.

Parameters:

  • p1 – The first vertex

  • p2 – The second vertex

distance_from_disc(disc: navground.core.Disc, penetration: bool = False) → float#
distance_from_point(point: Vector2) → float#
property e1#
Type:

Vector2

The unit vector along the segment

property e2#
Type:

Vector2

The unit vector perpendicular to the segment. Oriented to the left with respect to e1

property length#
Type:

float

The segment length

property p1#
Type:

Vector2

The position of the first vertex

property p2#
Type:

Vector2

The position of the second vertex

class Disc#

A circular shape. Used to represent obstacles.

__init__(position: Vector2, radius: float) → None#

Constructs a new instance.

Parameters:

  • position – The position

  • radius – The radius

property position#
Type:

Vector2

The center of the disc in world frame

property radius#
Type:

float

Radius

class Neighbor#

A neighbor agent of circular shape.

__init__(position: Vector2, radius: float, velocity: Vector2 = array([0., 0.], dtype=float32), id: int = 0) → None#

Constructs a new instance.

Parameters:

  • position – The position

  • radius – The radius

  • velocity – The velocity

  • id – The identifier

property id#
Type:

int

An identifier for the id of agents or the individual agent. The interpretation is up to the behavior.

property velocity#
Type:

Vector2

The velocity

class GeometricState#
__init__() → None#
property line_obstacles#
Type:

List[navground.core.LineSegment]

The current list of line obstacles. positions are in the world fixed frame.

property neighbors#
Type:

List[navground.core.Neighbor]

The current list of neighbors. positions are in the world fixed frame.

property static_obstacles#
Type:

List[navground.core.Disc]

The current list of static obstacles. positions are in the world fixed frame.
